author.bio: Matt Obee is a design technologist specializing in accessibility, currently working as a Staff Accessibility Designer at GitHub. With almost two decades of experience spanning product design, UX, UI, and QA, he has a broad perspective on building inclusive software products and a pragmatic approach to getting things done. From small charities to global enterprises, retailers to government agencies, Matt has worked on projects of all shapes and sizes for a wide range of clients across a broad spectrum of industries.
